alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Fulton; Marion (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 6:12PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Marion, western Fulton and northern Baxter Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 612 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Price Place, or 7 miles northwest of Bull Shoals, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mountain Home... Bull Shoals... Lakeview in Baxter County... Briarcliff... Arkawana... Diamond Bay... Ott... Ozark Regional Airport... Gamaliel Landing... Ozark Isle... Fawn Park... Bull Shoals State Park... Colfax... Price Place... Midway in Baxter County... Gamaliel... Oakland... Peel... Three Brothers... Gepp... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for north central Arkansas.
